channel.title: [PI]Few problems
channel.description:
I'm using Destination-pk a PI based source . It has a few errors i need help fixing.
1. Fishing is messed up a little you can fish but once you click somewhere else you move away and are still doing the fishing emote.
2. Woodcutting and mining is the exact same thing.
3. It seems the weapons have the correct stat bonuses but defensive is too effective i suppose it's hard as heck to hit some npcs / you hit really low with weapons like gses even though the correct str bonus is intact.
Thanks for your time!

item.title: [PI]Few problems
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

In your CombatAssistant class

Find

/**

  • Melee
    **/

And everything under that calculates melee hits.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Few problems
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Well instead of checking the weapons strengths and bonuses, you should maybe check the armour’s bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Few problems
item.dc:creator: @immortalityftw immortalityftw
item.description:
@immortalityftw wrote:

thanks but the problem is more with pvp than pvn

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Few problems
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Maybe defence on your NPC’s are too high. Check your spawn your spawn-config.cfg, find the NPC ID and the coords it is located. Towards the right of the file you’ll see Attack/Defence, try lowering the defence and see if that helps.

Hope I help

Read full topic
